title: The Best and Worst of AHS: Apocalypse | Season 8 Review
author: GameSpot Universe
comment: I think Constance should have taught her kids to look both ways before crossing the street..

"She needed the help of a powerful Voodoo Queen!" My biggest gripe is their horrible treatment of Marie Laveau...this is the Mambo whose power supposedly rivals a Supreme, and all they managed to get her to do is a little barrier. She should have been able to hurt Michael badly before being taken down or fleeing.

This season started off so strong, the story was unique and dark but the overuse of flashbacks def killed the vibe for me.
Also the ending, I really liked the idea of Mallory being an angel or some kind of powerful entity that could take on Michael. And the ending totally missed a chance for an epic show down and replaced it with a hit n run... I love AHS but come on.
“I expect Evan Peters and Sarah Paulson to be huge factors next season” Oof
I'm mad that Zoey Queenie and misty had like 20 min of screen time put together
description:
Ryan and Greg wrap up American Horror Story: Apocalypse with their Season 8 review. Find out their favorite and not-so-favorite moments of the season and how it could have been even better!
